xml_wiarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_WIARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_WIARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00021 #error "wide char i/o not supported on this platform"
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <istream>
00025 
00026 //#include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_warchive.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/archive/basic_text_iprimitive.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/archive/basic_xml_iarchive.hpp>
00030 
00031 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00032 
00033 namespace boost { 
00034 namespace archive {
00035 
00036 template<class CharType>
00037 class basic_xml_grammar;
00038 typedef basic_xml_grammar<wchar_t> xml_wgrammar;
00039 
00040 template<class Archive>
00041 class xml_wiarchive_impl : 
00042     public basic_text_iprimitive<std::wistream>,
00043     public basic_xml_iarchive<Archive>
00044 {
00045 #ifdef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00046 public:
00047 #else
00048     friend class detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00049     friend class basic_xml_iarchive<Archive>;
00050     friend class load_access;
00051 protected:
00052 #endif
00053     // instances of micro xml parser to parse start preambles
00054     // scoped_ptr doesn't play nice with borland - so use a naked pointer
00055     // scoped_ptr<xml_wgrammar> gimpl;
00056     xml_wgrammar *gimpl;
00057     std::wistream & get_is(){
00058         return is;
00059     }
00060     template<class T>
00061     void load(T & t){
00062         basic_text_iprimitive<std::wistream>::load(t);
00063     }
00064     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00065     load(char * t);
00066     #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00067     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00068     load(wchar_t * t);
00069     #endif
00070     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00071     load(std::string &s);
00072     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00073     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00074     load(std::wstring &ws);
00075     #endif
00076     template<class T>
00077     void load_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int){
00078         basic_xml_iarchive<Archive>::load_override(t, 0);
00079     }
00080     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00081     load_override(class_name_type & t, int);
00082     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(void) 
00083     init();
00084     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00085     xml_wiarchive_impl(std::wistream & is, unsigned int flags) ;
00086     BOOST_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00087     ~xml_wiarchive_impl();
00088 };
00089 
00090 // do not derive from the classes below.  If you want to extend this functionality
00091 // via inhertance, derived from xml_wiarchive_impl instead.  This will
00092 // preserve correct static polymorphism.
00093 
00094 // same as xml_wiarchive below - without the shared_ptr_helper
00095 class naked_xml_wiarchive : 
00096     public xml_wiarchive_impl<naked_xml_wiarchive>
00097 {
00098 public:
00099     naked_xml_wiarchive(std::wistream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00100         xml_wiarchive_impl<naked_xml_wiarchive>(is, flags)
00101     {}
00102     ~naked_xml_wiarchive(){}
00103 };
00104 
00105 } // namespace archive
00106 } // namespace boost
00107 
00108 // note special treatment of shared_ptr. This type needs a special
00109 // structure associated with every archive.  We created a "mix-in"
00110 // class to provide this functionality.  Since shared_ptr holds a
00111 // special esteem in the boost library - we included it here by default.
00112 #include <boost/archive/shared_ptr_helper.hpp>
00113 
00114 namespace boost { 
00115 namespace archive {
00116 
00117 class xml_wiarchive : 
00118     public xml_wiarchive_impl<xml_wiarchive>,
00119     public detail::shared_ptr_helper
00120 {
00121 public:
00122     xml_wiarchive(std::wistream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00123         xml_wiarchive_impl<xml_wiarchive>(is, flags)
00124     {}
00125     ~xml_wiarchive(){}
00126 };
00127 
00128 } // namespace archive
00129 } // namespace boost
00130 
00131 // required by export
00132 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::xml_wiarchive)
00133 
00134 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00135 
00136 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00137 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_WIARCHIVE_HPP
